mapper.select: SELECT FRMNO, FRMNAME, FRMDESC, FRMCONTENTS FROM SGN_FORM WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SGN_DOC (SDTITLE, SDCONTENTS, SDDATE, SDMODDATE, DELETEFLAG, SDSTATE, USERNO, FRMNO) VALUES ( #{sdtitle}, #{sdcontents}, NOW(), NOW(), #{deleteflag}, #{sdstate}, #{userno}, #{frmno})
mapper.select: SELECT SD.SDNO, SD.SDTITLE, SF.FRMNAME, SD.SDDATE, SD.SDSTATE FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN SGN_FORM SF ON SD.FRMNO = SF.FRMNO WHERE SD.DELETEFLAG = 'N' AND SDSTATE = '1';
